mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCART(CARTNUM, ID, PRODUCTNUM, AMOUNT, PAYCHECK, REGDATE, TOTAL) VALUES(NULL, #{id}, #{productNum},#{amount},0,#{regDate},#{total})
mapper.select:
SELECT C.*,P.NAME , P.PRICE FROM TCART C LEFT JOIN TPRODUCT P USING (PRODUCTNUM) WHERE C.ID=#{id}
ORDER BY REGDATE ASC, CARTNUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow} ,#{perPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE TCART SET AMOUNT=#{amount},TOTAL=#{total} WHERE CARTNUM=#{cartNum}
mapper.select: SELECT C.*,P.NAME,P.PRODUCTNUM FROM TCART C LEFT JOIN TPRODUCT P USING(PRODUCTNUM) WHERE C.CARTNUM=#{cartNum} AND C.ID=#{id}
